channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Dubbo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Dubbo

item.title: CVE-2023-23638|2024-08-02T10:35:33.761Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dubbo
item.description:
A deserialization vulnerability existed when dubbo generic invoke, which could lead to malicious code execution.
This issue affects Apache Dubbo 2.7.x version 2.7.21 and prior versions; Apache Dubbo 3.0.x version 3.0.13 and prior versions; Apache Dubbo 3.1.x version 3.1.5 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46279|2024-08-02T20:37:40.310Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dubbo
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Dubbo.This issue only affects Apache Dubbo 3.1.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to the latest version, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-29234|2024-08-02T14:00:15.993Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20dubbo
item.description:
A deserialization vulnerability existed when decode aÂ malicious package.This issue affects Apache Dubbo: from 3.1.0 through 3.1.10, from 3.2.0 through 3.2.4.
Users are recommended to upgrade to the latest version, which fixes the issue.
